description: The BlackYak Mishima hoody is a product for cold and dry environments and multi-use activities. The fleece has been constructed using Cordura® fibres for extended durability and mechanical strength. Core muscles are further protected from cold temperatures with the addition of a bonded stretch panel on the front of the garment. The panel features signature BlackYak styling and integrates four pockets with zipper closures.
name: Black Yak Mishima Hoody - Mens
